p: The differential buffer composition of nephro solutions is very important because it could prevent worsening of metabolic acidosis, which is a common complication in uremic patients. [ 7] Metabolic acidosis is related to negative nitrogen balance as well as enhanced protein catabolism. In a chronic condition, it also suppresses albumin synthesis. [ 3, 5] For that reason, we used Aminomel Nephro 6% solutions in our study.
